-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Cairo backend for the Aivika simulation library
--   
--   This package complements the Aivika and Aivika Experiment packages and
--   it allows rendering the charts using the Chart-cairo library.
@package aivika-experiment-cairo
@version 3.1


-- | Tested with: GHC 7.8.3
--   
--   This module defines a renderer that uses the Chart-cairo library based
--   on Cairo for rendering charts with simulation results.
module Simulation.Aivika.Experiment.Chart.Backend.Cairo

-- | This renderer uses the Chart-cairo library based on Cairo for
--   rendering charts with simulation results.
data CairoRenderer
CairoRenderer :: FileFormat -> CairoRenderer
instance ChartRendering CairoRenderer
